oai_dc:dc.dc:title: COASTAL PROCESSES IN GUARDAMAR BAY (SPAIN)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chapapria, Vicent J. de Esteban
Gonzalez, J. Javier Diez
Parra, Miguel Arenillas
Gimeno, Rafael Cortes
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: coastal processes
Guardamar Bar
Spain
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The surrounding coastal area of the Segura's River mouth has registered in the last years many erosion problems. It is one of the biggest coastal conjunct in the Spanish mediterranean coast. A whole of studies was carried out to determine littoral and coastal processes in this area.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 21 (1988): Proceedings of 21st Conference on Coastal Engineering, Torremolinos, Spain, 1988.; 99
